titleStmt.title: Lifes farewell. Or A funerall sermon preached at Saint Iohns in the Deuises in Wilshiere, the 30. of August last 1614 At the funerall of Iohn Drew Gentleman. By George Ferebe Master of Arts, and preacher of the Word at Bishops Cannings in Wilshire.
titleStmt.author: Ferebe, George, 1573-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin, for Ralph Mabbe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
